action.action-desc: Mr. Crenshaw (for himself, Mrs. Miller-Meeks, and Mr. Khanna) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Commissioner of Food and Drugs, to issue guidance on considerations for conducting clinical trials for psychedelic assisted therapy.

section.header: Guidance on considerations for conducting clinical trials for psychedelic assisted therapy
section.text: The Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Commissioner of Food and Drugs, shallâ€”

paragraph.text: not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act, issue for public comment draft guidance on considerations for conducting clinical trials for psychedelic assisted therapy, including how those seeking an investigational use exemption for such clinical trials should request interactive support by the Food and Drug Administration; and
not later than 180 days after issuing such draft guidance, finalize such guidance.
